titles.title: You May Have The Joy Bells

authors.author: J. Edward Ruark William J. Kirkpatrick

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Joy bells ringing in your heart! newline Joy bells ringing in your heart! newline Take the Savior here below newline With you ev'rywhere you go; newline He will keep the joy bells newline Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You may have the joy bells newline Ringing in your heart, newline And a peace that newline From You never will depart. newline Walk the straight and narrow way; newline Live for Jesus ev'ry day. newline He will keep the joy bells newline Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Love of Jesus in its fullness newline You may know, newline And this love to those around newline You sweetly show. newline Words of kindness always say; newline Deeds of mercy do each day, newline Then He'll keep the joy bells newline Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You will meet with trials newline As you journey home; newline Grace sufficent He will give to overcome. newline Tho' unseen by mortal eye, newline He is with you evernigh, newline And He'll keep the joy bells newline Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Let your life speak well newline Of Jesus ev'ry day; newline Own His right to ev'ry service newline You can pay. newline Sinners you can help to win newline If your life is pure and clean, newline And you keep the joy bells newline Ringing in your heart.
